channel.title: rtl8821CU on gngpp
channel.description: Recent content in rtl8821CU on gngpp

item.title: PVE、Linux、rtl8821CU芯片网卡AP模式满速配置
item.description: hostapd touch /etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf touch /etc/modprobe.d/rtl8821cu.conf /etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf # pve bridge bridge=vmbr0 # AP netdevice name (without 'ap' postfix, i.e., wlan0 uses wlan0ap for # management frames); ath0 for madwifi interface=wlxe0e1a91c5537 driver=nl80211 ssid=iKuai hw_mode=a ieee80211n=1 ieee80211h=1 ieee80211d=1 country_code=US channel=36 vht_oper_centr_freq_seg0_idx=42 vht_oper_chwidth=2 ht_capab=[HT40+] wpa=2 wpa_passphrase=fengge123 wpa_key_mgmt=WPA-PSK wpa_pairwise=CCMP /etc/modprobe.d/rtl8821cu.conf options rtl8821cu rtw_vht_enable=2
